Member Function Documentation

static FillModel (   $ModelIdentifier,
  $Filling = array( ),
  $IgnoreInexistentPlaceHolder = false 
)
static

Fills a model and returns the combined content.

Parameters
string$ModelIdentifier,:The identifier of the model to be filled.
array$Filling,:The filling data as an array.
[Place holder] => [the value to be inserted].
boolean$IgnoreInexistentPlaceHolder,:Whether value assigments for inexsitent place holders should be ignored or not. If not, an exception is thrown whenever a place holder in $Filling is not found in the model. Default value is false.
Returns
string
Note
$Filling and $IgnoreInexistentPlaceHolder are optional parameters.
static RegisterModel (   $File,
  $ModelIdentifier = '' 
)
static

Registers a model to Mondraviel.

Parameters
string$File,:The file to be registered as a model.
string$ModelIdentifier,:An identifier later used to access the model.
Note
$ModelIdentifier is an optional parameter.
Its default value is 
\basename( $File )
.
